resources.string: Help us improve our products and services

The elaboration of this questionnaire is completely anonymous. The information collected will only be used for statistical and training purposes. At no time will any information obtained be used or provided to third parties. For any clarification, you can contact Diario de Trassierra through the email account info@diariotrassierra.com
How long have you been using Diario de Trassierra´s products/services?
How did you find out about the Diario de Trassierra website?
Will you enter the Diario de Trassierra website again?
From which device do you usually consult our electronic services?
Would you be willing to purchase a premium digital subscription?
No i`m not willing to pay
Yes, I would be willing to pay between 5 and 10 euros per month
Yes, I would be willing to pay more than 10 euros per month
What do you think of our paper subscription service?
I do not use it, it is an obsolete medium that is doomed to disappear
I do not use it, but several people close to me continue to use this format
I use it on specific occasions
I use it daily and it seems much better than the electronic format
Please tell us your overall satisfaction with the Diario de Trassierra website
Would you recommend the services of Diario de Trassierra to your family or friends?

This Trassierra Diary application is the first mobile application to put students knowledge into practice. Its operation is as follows. First it has a welcome page in which we have a button to start entering the user`s data, after filling in the user`s information anonymously, a questionnaire consisting of 8 questions is passed to assess the user´s knowledge about our application, how You have heard about it and what you think, finally, if you decide, you can send the user information with the answers of your personal data to a server. It also has a menu where you can see information about the creator and the creation date of the application and another menu option where you will see this application help to understand it better.
